message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 might be a bit high, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.
